title: Flag Patient for Intervention
description: A risk model identifies a patient whose risk score has significantly increased. The system needs to flag them for intervention.

tasks.description: A nightly batch job runs the risk stratification model on all patients.
The system detects a patient whose risk score has crossed the 'high-risk' threshold.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system's logic correctly identifies a change in patient status.

tasks.description: Automatically create a task in a care manager's work queue to review the patient's chart.
tasks.expected_outcome: A human is prompted to review the high-risk patient, ensuring timely intervention.
